app.name: All API Hub
app.description: Manage AI relays and your accounts and balances in one place

navigation.externalCheckinAllHint: Open unchecked external check-ins. Ctrl/Cmd: open all. Shift: open in new window. Ctrl/Cmd+Shift: open all in new window.

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.warning: You are about to delete account {{accountName}}. Please verify before confirming to delete this account
delete.noResponse: Delete operation did not return successfully

tempWindowFallbackReminder.title: Enable temporary window mode for requests
tempWindowFallbackReminder.titleTempWindowOnly: Enable temporary window mode for requests
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionDisabled: {{accountName}} needs a temporary popup window to open and pass protection so requests can complete successfully. Enable it in Settings > Data Refresh
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionDisabledTempWindowOnly: {{accountName}} needs a temporary popup window to open and pass protection so requests can complete successfully. Enable it in Settings > Data Refresh
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionDisabledWithCookieInterceptor: {{accountName}} needs the protection-bypass flow on Firefox. A temporary popup window will open to obtain cookies, and Cookie Interceptor will attach them to requests. Enable it in Settings > Data Refresh
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionPermission: {{accountName}} needs Cookie Interceptor permission so the temporary popup window can open and requests can complete successfully. Grant it in Settings > Permissions
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionPermissionTempWindowOnly: {{accountName}} needs permission to open a temporary popup window so requests can complete successfully. Grant it in Settings > Permissions
tempWindowFallbackReminder.descriptionPermissionWithCookieIntercept: {{accountName}} needs Cookie Interceptor permissions on Firefox. The temporary popup window must open to obtain cookies, and requests will attach them. Grant it in Settings > Permissions

copyKey.title: Key List
copyKey.noKeysDescription: Create a default key quickly, or create a custom key with advanced settings.
copyKey.noKeyFoundAfterCreate: No key was found after creating one. Please try again.
copyKey.createNotSupported: This account does not support creating keys from this dialog.

ccswitch.title: Export to CC Switch
ccswitch.description: Send this provider configuration directly to CC Switch via deep link

descriptions.model: When available, models are loaded from /v1/models for selection. You can also type a custom model id.

cliSupport.title: CLI support check
cliSupport.noCached: No cached CLI support result found for this token. Run "Verify CLI Support" from the model list to test compatibility before exporting.
cliSupport.cachedHint: Showing a cached result from the latest CLI support simulation for this token.

kiloCode.title: Export Kilo Code JSON
kiloCode.description: Generate Kilo Code / Roo Code provider profiles from your selected sites and tokens.

warning.title: Plaintext API keys
warning.description: The exported JSON contains API keys in plaintext. Store it securely and do not share it.

help.perSiteDescription: Select sites to load tokens automatically. The first token is preselected, and you can select multiple tokens per site.
help.afterExportTitle: After export: how to use it
help.manualDescription: Click "Copy apiConfigs" and find providerProfiles.apiConfigs in the Kilo Code / Roo Code export configurations and paste them in.
help.importDescription: Click “Download settings” to save {{filename}}, then import it in Kilo Code. Import is incremental: it adds providers and won’t remove your existing providers (same-name entries may be updated).

descriptions.modelId: Recommended per API key (Kilo Code typically requires a model ID). Defaults to the first model from this API key's upstream model list.

messages.loadTokensFailed: Failed to load tokens for this site.
messages.loadModelsFailed: Failed to load upstream models for this API key.
messages.noTokensDescription: This site will be skipped until a token is created.
messages.noModelsDescription: No upstream models were returned for this API key. Kilo Code typically requires a model ID — please enter one manually.
messages.modelIdRequiredDescription: Select or enter a model ID for all selected API keys to enable export (missing: {{count}}).
messages.nothingToExportDescription: Select at least one exportable token/site to enable copy/download.

cliproxy.title: Import to CLIProxyAPI
cliproxy.description: Create or update an OpenAI-compatible provider in CLIProxyAPI.

descriptions.baseUrl: OpenAI-compatible upstream base URL, typically ending with /v1.
descriptions.proxyUrl: Optional proxy URL used for this API key entry.
descriptions.models: Map upstream model names to optional aliases (name → alias). When available, upstream models are loaded from /v1/models for selection.

claudeCodeRouter.title: Import to Claude Code Router
claudeCodeRouter.description: Create or update a provider in Claude Code Router. Models are required.

descriptions.providerApiBaseUrl: This should be the full /v1/chat/completions endpoint.
descriptions.models: Enter one model per line or separate by commas.
descriptions.restartAfterSave: Router may require restart for config changes to take effect.

firefox.popupLimitation: This feature cannot be used normally in the popup of Firefox browser. Please use the sidebar mode to add accounts
firefox.sidebarInstruction: Click on the extension icon in the browser toolbar, then select the 'Sidebar' option to open the sidebar mode

multiSelect.noOptionsAllowCustom: No options available. Type to create one

searchableSelect.noOptionsAllowCustom: No options available. Type to create one

modelListInput.title: Model List (name[, alias] one per line):
